config.label: Transit and Road risks whilst the insured items are moving by own  power on public roads
Salvage: In case of total loss Insurer will give the option to the Insured to purchase the salvage based on the amount of the highest bid obtained by the Insurer

Basis of settlement :Total loss claims will be settled on the current market value of the vehicle on the day of accident and insured should submit 3 valuation report for consideration of loss surveyor
Claims procedure: Existing claim procedure attached and should form part of the policy

fields.label: Strike, riot and civil commotion and malicious damage
Overtime, night works , works on public holidays and express freight
Cover for extra charges for Airfreight
Cover When Items are hired in / out
Inland Transit including loading and unloading cover
Including the risk of erection, resettling and dismantling
Cover when items are hired out
Cover for water well drilling rigs and equipment
Automatic Reinstatement of sum insured at prorata additional premium
Special condition :It is understood and agreed that exclusion 'C' will not apply to accidental losses'.

Third Party Liability- whilst on site, owned and/or hired parking yard, during participation in any sales promotions, sports, social events, display at various sites within GCC either contract of hire or otherwise
Total Loss:An equipment will be considered as total loss (destroyed) in case the repair cost is 50% or more than the NRV of the equipment (considered as constructive total loss)
Including cover for loading/ unloading and delivery risks
